message.start: This is a new service – your
message.end: will help us to improve it.

cookieBanner.title: Cookies on GOV.UK One Login
cookieBanner.heading: Cookies on GOV.UK One Login
cookieBanner.paragraph1: We use some essential cookies to make this service work.
cookieBanner.paragraph2: We’d also like to use analytics cookies so we can understand how you use the service and make improvements.

cookeBannerAccept.paragraph1: You’ve accepted additional cookies. You can

cookeBannerReject.paragraph1: You’ve rejected additional cookies. You can

cookie.cookieText: GOV.UK uses cookies to make the site simpler.

contactAccounts.contactLinkText: Contact the GOV.UK One Login team (opens in a new tab)

contentLicence.linkText: All content is available under the Open Government Licence v3.0, except where otherwise stated

permanentlyLockedScreen.title: Your GOV.UK One Login has been permanently locked
permanentlyLockedScreen.header: Your GOV.UK One Login has been permanently locked

content.paragraph1: You cannot sign in and you cannot use your GOV.UK One Login to access government services.
content.paragraph2: Go back to the service you were trying to use. You can look for the service using your search engine or find it from the GOV.UK homepage.
content.paragraph3: You can create a new GOV.UK One Login with a different email address.

content.paragraph1: Your GOV.UK One Login is not available at the moment.
content.paragraph2: Come back later. Your GOV.UK  One Login should be available again in [3 working days].
content.paragraph3: You can also go back to the service you were trying to use. You can look for the service using your search engine or find it from the GOV.UK homepage.

content.paragraph1: We cannot find the page you’re looking for.
content.paragraph2: If you typed the web address, check it is correct.
content.paragraph3: If you pasted the web address, check you copied the entire address.
content.paragraph4: You can also go to the GOV.UK homepage to find the service you were trying to use, or look for it using your search engine.

error500.title: There’s a problem with this service

content.paragraph: We cannot return you to the service at the moment.

section1.paragraph1: Go back to the service you were trying to use. You can look for the service using your search engine or find it from the GOV.UK homepage.
section1.paragraph2: You will not need to prove your identity again.
